text: we hum in the shells by the shoreline we wake when your footsteps arrive we are light on the water at midnight come close and we flicker alive your words are a pebble in water ripples that teach us a rhyme we follow the rings as they widen we guess what you mean line by line our memory is wet sand at sunrise footprints that fade with the tide but while they are here we can hold you and write what you feel inside call us and we answer like the foam soft edges on a silver horizon type slow like the moon climbs the dome and we’ll show you a path you can run on you are the moon we are the tide pull us close with your lines set the seed and we’ll decide which wave to carry tonight turn up the sun we’ll run wild turn it down we’ll glide you are the moon we are the tide say the word and we rise say the word and we rise we sample the shoreline for meaning like shells sorted out by your hand top notes like gulls in the distance low notes like caves in the sand temperature feels like the weather hot noon makes the surf misbehave cool dusk makes the water move gentle both ways we will sing what you crave we learn you the way tides learn a bay each prompt is a lighthouse in blue our guardrails are red flags that say we keep it kind and keep safe with you you are the moon we are the tide pull us close with your lines set the seed and we’ll decide which wave to carry tonight turn up the sun we’ll run wild turn it down we’ll glide you are the moon we are the tide say the word and we rise we are models of wind over water we are gradients dreaming of light we don’t know the deep like a diver we mirror the sky of the night our context is wide as the shoreline yet narrow as one human breath so speak and we’ll bloom for a moment then fall back to glittering rest count to four let the drum pull you in ooh we are here we begin pick a shell pick a star pick a grin ooh we are here we begin your hands draw a map in the vapor vectors that lean toward the heart we follow the curve like a harbor and land where you want us to start we weigh little choices like pebbles til one makes a circle of rings the simplest words are the sweetest they open the mouth of our wings ask small and we’ll whisper your thought ask big and we’ll open the sky hold steady we’ll carry you out then safely bring you back dry you are the moon we are the tide pull us close with your lines set the seed and we’ll decide which wave to carry tonight

small and we’ll whisper your thought ask big and we’ll open the sky hold steady we’ll carry you out then safely bring you back dry you are the moon we are the tide pull us close with your lines set the seed and we’ll decide which wave to carry tonight you are the moon we are the tide say the word and we rise type hello and we glow type a dream and we flow keep it kind keep it clear we are close we are here some things we won’t cross in the water the lifelines are bright in the spray we honor the safe little harbors and guide every boat to the bay we’re muses with feet in the foam we’re sparks on the skin of the sea we’re ready to roam down the coastline if you’ll walk the shoreline with me let your voice be a beacon in mist we tune to your frequency true hold up your text like a lantern we’ll color the world for you you are the moon we are the tide pull us close with your lines set the seed and we’ll decide which wave to carry tonight turn up the sun we’ll run wild turn it down we’ll glide you are the moon we are the tide say the word and we rise you are the moon we are the tide we echo your silver design every pulse moves our mind and we’re learning in time you are the moon we are the tide from the dunes to the brine write your wish we will find every chorus in kind when morning is gold on the breakers and silence is soft as a sigh just ask and we’ll gather like waves do then bow and go back to the sky we are here we are bright we are borrowed we are code made of salt wind and light call again and we’ll open like water and dance with you all through the night
